get.description: Fetch an address by id.

data.full_address: 285 Caley Street, Eldoraigne Ext 6, Centurion, City of Tshwane, Gauteng

provinces.description: only include results within these provinces

categories.description: only include addresses having these categories / subcategories

post.description:
Returns a list of address candidates that match search filters.

Please note that the **"address_parts"** field in the **"attributes"** section of the response is **deprecated**. Do not use or rely on these fields

get.description: Fetch an address by id.
Returns a list of address candidates that match search filters.

Returns a paginated list of police stations that match filters.

risk_index.description: Numeric risk of a property due to water inflow from tsunami or tidal wave type events.

risk_classification.description: The classification of the risk index.

risk_index.description: Numeric risk of a property due to storm surges and storm risks.

risk_classification.description: The classification of the risk index.

stand_size_bucket.description: The subplace stand size bucket the property falls within

stand_estimated_price_per_sqm.description: Estimated price per square meter (based on the stand size) for the stand

building_size.description: Building size in square meters for all buildings on the property

has_building_size_price.description: Whether the property has an estimated price per square meter for the building size

has_general_risk_index.description: Indicates whether general flood vulnerability has been calculated for the stand

general_risk_index.description: A non-negative risk index, indicating the river flood risk relevant to a stand in general, e.g. to people or vehicles on the stand and outside enclosed structures.

has_infrastructure_risk_index.description: Indicates whether infrastucture flood vulnerability has been calculated for the stand

infrastructure_risk_index.description: A non-negative risk index, indicating the river flood risk relevant to infrastructure on a stand

ltv_1.description: Loan-to-value for a deposit of 10% and an interest rate of 10%

ltv_2.description: Loan-to-value for a deposit of 20% and an interest rate of 10%

downturn_ltv_1.description: Downturn loan-to-value for a deposit of 10% and an interest rate of 10%

downturn_ltv_2.description: Downturn loan-to-value for a deposit of 20% and an interest rate of 10%

has_general_risk_index.description: Whether a micro landslide risk index has been caluated for the stand

general_risk_index.description: The micro landslide risk index for the stand

has_building_risk_index.description: Whether a micro landslide risk index has been caluated for the buildings on the stand

building_risk_index.description: The micro landslide risk index for the buildings on the stand (0 - 15)

valuation.description: Property valuation according to the municipality.

validity_end_date.description: End date of the validity period for the current municipal valuation.

validity_start_date.description: Start date of the validity period for the current municipal valuation.

has_deed.description: Indicates whether the property is linked to deeds information

has_address.description: Indicates whether the property is linked to an address

has_cadastre.description: Indicates whether the property is linked to a cadastre

is_garage.description: Indicates whether the unit is a garage or storage unit

is_vacant.description: Indicates a high probability of no structures built on the property

is_inside_scheme.description: Indicates whether the property falls within a scheme

municipality.description: Name of the municipality that the property falls within

annual_average.description: Annual average potential capture of roof rain water (litres)

monthly_average.description: Monthly average capture of roof rain water (litres)

month_minimum_average.description: Monthly average capture of roof rain water for the month with minimum rainfall (litres)

month_maximum_average.description: Monthly average capture of roof rain water for the month with maximum rainfall (litres)

building_count.description: Number of buildings on the property considered

avgerage.description: Average capture of roof rain water for the month (litres)

estimate.description: Estimated cost of constructing a new, similar building to the building under evaluation.

low_estimate.description: For properties without a building size an upper limit placed on the replacement cost for the building on the property. For properties with a bulding size, the same as the replacement cost.

high_estimate.description: For properties without a building size a lower limit placed on the replacement cost for the building on the property. For properties with a bulding size, the same as the replacement cost.

use_bounds.description: Whether the upper and lower bounds were used to produce an average replacement cost.

confidence.description: Confidence level associated with the replacement cost estimate.

feasibility_index.description: Numerical index of the feasibility of a solar panel installation on roof surfaces for full title properties (0 - 1).

feasibility_classification.description: Classification of the solar feasibility index.

sufficiency_ratio.description: The kWh per m<sup>2</sup> (kWh per day / total roof area)

suggested_system_size.description: Suggested size of a standard solar panel installation.

system_sizes.description: List of system sizes available for usable roof area.

system_options.description: Multiple options for solar installations for the property ordered by the most to least feasible.

kwh_per_day_north.description: Average kWh generated per day by north facing panels.

kwh_per_day_east.description: Average kWh generated per day by east facing panels.

kwh_per_day_west.description: Average kWh generated per day by west facing panels.

sufficiency_ratio.description: The kWh per m<sup>2</sup> (kWh per day / total roof area)

has_installation.description: Indicates if the property has a solar installation

image_date.description: The quarter of the source imagery to determine the installation

estimated_size.description: The estimated size of the solar system in sqm

estimated_panels.description: The estimated number of solar panels (a solar panel is taken to have a 2 sqm size)

stand_size.description: Extent according to Surveyor General / Municipal cadastre (sqm)

building_size.description: Estimated footprint size of the building (sqm)

building_floor_size.description: Estimated floor size of the building (sqm)

risk_index.description: Normalised risk index between 0 and 1 that the building on the property will be affected by ponding

risk_index_scaled.description: Normalised risk index between 0 and 1 that is scaled by expected differences in rainfall

risk_category.description: Category associated with the risk index.

empty_property.description: Indicates whether the valuation is for an empty property.
